reviews.comments:
Tal cual la descripción. Cerca de subtes y línea de micros. 
El check out fue muy flexible. Gracias Gustavo. Volveremos
Muy buena ubicación y excelente relación costo beneficio. Volvería a hospedarme aquí cuando vaya a Buenos Aires

Gustavo es un gran anfitrión! Fue amable y predispuesto en todo momento. El departamento es muy lindo y decorado con buen gusto. Cómodo realmente. Está a un par de cuadras de avenidas principales y centros turísticos. Muy buena estadía!!!

Hermoso departamento, completo, amplio, nos sentimos muy cómodos y a gusto. La ubicación excelente, todo cerca y el barrio muy lindo y seguro. El anfitrión amable, atento a cualquier necesidad nuestra y respetuoso.

El departamento es tan bueno como se ve en fotos! Impecable, cómodo, pulcro, con olor a limpio, colorido. Gustavo pensó en todos los detalles y no falta nada para que uno se sienta a gusto. La relación precio/producto, difícil de superar.
De destacar la predisposición de Gustavo para que no hay ningún inconveniente y la estadía sea un placer.
Para mi, un 10
Todo estuvo muy bien. De acuerdo con el anuncio. El departamento estaba impecable. Es espacioso y muy lindo. La zona muy buena, a poquitas cuadras del subte y de las líneas de colectivo.
Encantador, gentil y cercano. Nos hizo sentir como en casa desde nuestro primer paso en Buenos Aires!

El apto está bien situado, cerca de dos estaciones de metro. El barrio es tranquilo.
El apartamento está completo.

Gustavo un excelente anfitrion, al pendiente de los detalles. 
El departamento, fiel a la publicacion en la pagina, lo cual es super importante
Muy bien ubicado, y sin ruidos
Muy recomendable! Gustavo es una persona muy atenta y con mucha disposición de ayudarte en lo que necesites. Muchas gracias Gustavo, un abrazo!!
Lugar súper cómodo y céntrico. Cerca del subte, del centro y del barrio Recoleta. Lugar súper recomendado.

El dpto está muy buen ubicado! Muy central, cerca del subte y de micros para ir a lugares turísticos. Una o dos cuadras caminando. El barrio es tranquilo y seguro. El dpto es muy rico, espacioso y las instalaciones son nuevas. Gustavo siempre estuvo disponible para resolver dudas o preguntas. Tuvimos un pequeño problema con el microondas pero él respondió y nos dio opciones de inmediato. Sin duda volveríamos si es que visitamos Buenos Aires d nuevo. Gracias!!

Gustavo es un excelente anfitrión, siempre disponible y flexible. Siempre correcto, logra generar igual una relación de confianza y comodidad. El departamento es muy cómodo y arreglado con muy  buen gusto. Muy recomendable.

El espacio es perfecto. Gus es muy amable y nos ayudo en tudo.
La habitación es comfortable, con delis y mercados acerca. El subte es en dos cuadras.

O apartamento é perfeito, Gustavo é muito gentil e atencioso, nos ajudou em tudo. O aprtamento é confortável, tem padarias e mercados por perto. O metrô fica a duas quadras. Bairro tranquilo e sossegado.

El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, buena ubicación y transporte. Los servicios de internet, agua caliente, etc funcionan en pefectas condiciones, el Anfitrión un 7! la mejor información y los mejores de datos de que hacer, donde comer, donde ir al tanto, teatro, etc. Lo recomiendo a ojos cerrados, y lo haré a todos los que sepan que van a buenos aires. Muchas gracias por todo Gustavo!!!

Es verdad! There's no better place in BA!  Todo perfecto! Gustavo me recibió en el departamento que es precioso, estaba en perfectas condiciones tal cual las fotos, y fue muy servicial. La ubicacion es perfecta! Todo queda cerca de ahi. Lo recomiendo 100% y lo elegiría de nuevo mil veces! Gracias!!
El departamento es cómodo, con todo lo necesario para una excelente estadía. Gustavo estuvo todo el tiempo pendiente para atendernos. Muy buen anfitrión.

Fue ya la segunda vez que quedamos en uno de los apartamentos de Gustavo y nos gusto mucho todo. MUY buena comunicación, todo limpio y con mucho espacio, hay almohadas para todas las preferencias y la cama es muy cómoda, el área es espectacular (here I might have to mention that we didn't stay in this apartment in the end, but in the other in the Palermo area, which was due to a water damage in this house which needed to be solved urgently. But all was arranged by Gustavo in a perfect manner!). Gracias Gustavo por todo, un gustazo conocerte... y hasta la próxima vez espero-)

Gustavo es amable y preocupado de los detalles, servicial. El barrio es excelente, bien ubicado.
Un desperfecto en un electrodomestico fue solucionado en un par de horas !!

El apartamento estaba muy bien; tal cual las fotos; la ubicación muy buena también. 
Agradecer a Gustavo, fue un excelente anfitrión.

Gustavo facilitó el transporte desde el aeropuerto y, como no estaba en la ciudad, me dejó una nota muy amena con indicaciones claras y sencillas. En el apartamento habían más indicaciones y habían mapas de lugares que visitar en la ciudad. El apartamento tenía todo lo que decía y más, la comodidad del lugar, la calidez y limpieza de todo, el buen gusto en la decoración hicieron de mi estadía una de las mejores.

El barrio es muy accesible y cercano a muchos lugares. Me facilitaba el transporte en colectivos, metro subterráneo o incluso caminar. Hay muchas tiendas, restaurantes y lugares de entretenimiento muy cerca. Se percibe mucha seguridad a cualquier hora del día y sus calles son muy limpias.
Excelente estadía en el apartamento de Gustavo. Muy buena ubicación y el apto muy cómodo, limpio y en excelentes condiciones. Relación calidad precio inmejorable.
Gus es un anfitrión maravilloso! El apartamento es muy cómodo y esta cerca de restaurantes ricos. Un experiencia perfecto.
reviews.response: Gracias chicos!! Un placer haberlos conocido!

reviews.comments: Ademas de todas las comodidades y facilidades del apartamento posee una ubicacion encelente, fruterias, supermercados,  lineas de autobus transitan muy cerca llevandote donde quieras en baires Gustavo el anfitrion mejor imposible muy atento y flexible Sin dudar repetiriamos

Nos recibió Ricardo, amigo de Gustavo, quien fue muy amable y cordial, nos entregó información valiosa para nuestra estadía.
El Depto. contiene todas los artículos para hacer grata la estadía y las fotos son réplica exacta de como es el piso.
Esta muy bien ubicado en una zona cercana a movilidad y comercio de todas las cosas.
Es la segunda vez que me quedo en lo de Gustavo y salió todo de maravilla. El depto increíble y el un genio. Obviamente volveré.

NO HAY MEJOR LUGAR EN CENTRAL BUENOS AIRES. Gustavo no me pagó Naaada para este comentario, tampoco tuvo tiempo de hacerme beber qué sé yo u ofrecerme una parrilla o un volcán de dulce de leche. Pues... 
Si qui que ce soit, une ou deux personnes (lieu idéal pour un couple autant que pour une personne de passage alliant voyage et travail), souhaite(nt) être basé(s) aux premières loges du coeur de Buenos Aires, now THAT's The Place. 
Whether you wish to head wherever you are attracted to in BA, or be close to Av. Corrientes o Callao and/or beautiful jacarandas & simultaneously at an interesting walking distance from nearby neighborhoods up to Las Heras, this address in Viamonte is close to most of the best bookstores in the city. 
Donc, Ze meilleures librairies au centre de la ville, de l'avenue Corrientes avec le Teatro San Martín, à l'avenue Callao et sa place publique-parc-jardin aux arbres centenaires. Et le reste à l'avenant.
Enfin, en tant qu'hôte, Gustavo est des plus fiables, son accueil très sympa, son organisation impeccable. Et dans la cuisine Très bien rénovée, on peut aussi bien écrire que manger sur la belle table.
Una estadía allegretto con brio,
Nicolas G.

Un excelente lugar, muy buena úbicacion, el lugar es exactamente como en las fotos, basante amplio.  Gus nos dio bastantes tips al llegar, muy atento y estuvo siempre al pendiente via mensaje de texto.  En general un lugar bastante bonito, muy tranquilo y bastante seguro.

Excelente.  Gustavo está siempre en todo. 
Es una opción 100% recomendable

El apartamento es excelente y es aún más lindo de lo que aparece en las fotos. Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar una gran estadía. Además Gustavo es un gran anfitrión y está muy atento en cada detalle. Altamente recomendable.

Experiencia con el anfitrion: Excelente
La Zona: Muy Bien ubicada

El apartamento es acogedor y bien situado. 
Gustavo es un gran anfitrión. Gracias!

Gustavo fue absolutamente amable con nosotras, nos ayudo a coordinar el taxi desde el aeropuerto y hasta nos entrego un cálculo exacto del costo para tener el dinero en pesos argentinos. 
Al llegar nos espero con un rico café y galletas, nos entrego datos de la ciudad, mapas y guió nuestro itinerario por días con buenísimos comentarios y datos.
El departamento es tal cual se ve en las costos, esta muy bien ubicado, cerca de metro y locomoción a todas partes. Ricos lugares para comer cerca y el barrio es seguro. Esta equipado con todo lo necesario, cocina, lavadora, etc. el edificio es pequeño, por lo que es muy silencioso y tranquilo. Realmente supero nuestras expectativas. 
El último día Gustavo nos ayudo nuevamente con el taxi y estuvo atento durante todos los días a nuestras consultas... Excelente anfitrión y guía turístico. 
Mi madre y yo estamos encantadas!
reviews.response: Ustedes fueron adorables. Muchas gracias por elegirme. Saludos y espero recibirlas en el futuro!

reviews.comments:
Un genio Gus!!!
La verdad que no hay quejas, EXCELENTE TODO!!!
El apartamento es tal cual las fotos, limpio, ordenado, con todas las comodidades. Ubicación perfecta, cerca de todos los medios de transportes. 
La atención de Gus excelente al recibirnos, durante la estadía con cualquier duda, y en el momento de irnos, hasta el taxi monitoreado por el. La verdad que un cuidado excelente con sus huéspedes.
Ahh y otra cosa, el detalle de los bomboncitos, excelente!!
SUPER RECOMENDADO!!! 10 puntos!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias a uds. Fueron geniales. Y por suerte pude entregar su bombilla a sus amigas. Saludos. Gus

reviews.comments:
Quedarme en el apartamento de Gustavo ha sido, hasta ahora, mi mejor experiencia con Air Bnb. 
La ubicación es inmejorable, se llega caminando a casi todas partes, y tiene todo lo necesario cerca, y una vista genial desde la habitación.
El apartamento está perfectamente equipado y tiene todo lo necesario. En mi caso no hizo falta ya que era un viaje muy corto, pero para viajes más largos, cuenta con una cocina y un refrigerador que hacen la estancia más cómoda.
Por último, Gustavo es un gran anfitrión, nada más llegar nos recibió en la puerta del taxi, nos invitó a un café y nos enseñó sobre un mapa cosas que hacer, y nos guió sobre las que llevábamos pensadas. Es muy agradable y muy simpático, incluso nos dio varias opciones para ir hasta la casa desde el aeropuerto, y reservó un taxi para nosotros. 

En definitiva, un lugar y un anfitrión totalmente recomendables!
Ojalá pueda repetir pronto
reviews.response:
Gracias! Me gusto mucho poder recibirlos. La próxima no los dejo entrar si no traen Dunkin Donuts. jajajaja. Saludos y hasta la próxima!
Gus

reviews.comments: This place have everything you neet for a nice stay and Gus is very helpful , Grasias, Jan
To Be there is what everything what i want, perfect. Thanks Gustavo i come back to this beautiful place, Thanks Jan

Gustavo  est un hôte très très bien et remarquable à tous points de vue de vue.  Logement et emplacement très bien situé,  propre,  équipé etc.   De plus, il est un hôte très bienveillant et fait d'excellents recommandations de visites,restos etc.

Die Wohnung von Gustavo hat wirklich vom Schlafzimmerfenster den traumhaften Blick auf den Palacio de agua Corrientes - öffentliche Führung dort sehr zu empfehlen! Die Lage ist super: zur grünen subte D sind es nur 2 Blöcke. Kleine Kioske direkt um die Ecke, Wäscherei auch ganz nah. 2 gut arbeitende Klimaanlagen. Die Küche ist gut ausgestattet, tolle Handtücher lagen ebenso bereit wie Duschutensilien fürs Bad.
Gustavo hatte Infomaterial zusammengestellt und stellt für die Dauer des Besuchs auch eine subte Karte zur Verfügung. Hinsichtlich der Ein- und Auscheckzeiten hat Gustavo uns enorm geholfen!
Alles in allem sehr zu empfehlen - wir kommen gerne noch einmal wieder!!
Great place, spacious and good value and location. Recommended!

Gustavo was a great host. He was generous with his time initially to help us get our bearings in the city, and was very responsive to queries we had. The apartment itself is quiet, comfy, clean, in a great location, stylish and had all amenities we may have needed. Thanks for a great stay! Scott and Leith

Gus (Gustavo) is a great host. From the time we arrived, to the departure everything was perfect. Gus gave us an excellent briefing about BA, which was very helpful for us firsttime visitors. The apartment was clean with all the essentials, for a comfortable stay. We would definitely stay again with Gus. Highly recommended.

Very convenient if you are into tango (or garments). El Beso is 3 blocks away. The garment district is 3 blocks away too.
Obelisco and Nuevo Chique are a short bus ride away. Even Canning is not that far on the bus which stops near the yarn district.
Carrefour market and grocery stores are on the same block.
Parilla Pena is definitely worth a visit but if you don’t want to wait, get there at 8:00pm
Die Lage ist Klasse: im Zentrum mit sehr guter Verkehrsanbindung, dennoch ruhig gelegen. In dem Appartement haben wir uns wie Zuhause gefühlt. Ein idealer Aufenthalt, um in Südamerika anzukommen.

This place was just amazing! Gus is truly higher than a super host if there is one.   He made everything so easy for me. The apartment was better than described. I loved that I was in a cultured building that still has the “old fashioned” feel to it. It was an added bonus.
Great place to stay in Buenos aires. Friendly host and warming place. Highly recommended.

Fiel às imagens e aos demais comentários, a estadia com Gus foi ótima. O apartamento é super bem localizado, próximo a dois metrôs/subte. Gus conhece muito bem a cidade e nos deu dicas muito bacanas para aproveitar os poucos dias por ali. Também foi muito flexível com o check-out, nos permitindo tempo suficiente para deixar o local sem precisar correr.
great location, great communication and fab place to stay. the street can be noisy but once i used some ear plugs it was perfect!
Second stay at Gustavo's place. It's a great Airbnb, would stay again.

It's a stylish apartment in a great location, within walking distance from the tourist sights. Gus gave great tips on what to do and see in town, and was very fast at responding to queries. I'd stay again.

We highly recommend Gustavo’s place. It is a comfy apartment in an upscale neighborhood, Recoleta. The place was completely organized and clean.
In a walking distance we could visit most of the landmark sites, such as Obelisc, Pink house, Floralis Generica and La Recoleta cemetery.
Gustavo kindly answered all our questions, always willing to assist us. He even wrote some “must go” places on the whiteboard, helping us to decide where to go.
We would like to thank Gustavo for providing us everything we needed to enjoy our stay in Buenos Aires.

A comunicação com o Gustavo foi perfeita. O apto é bem localizado, próximo a estação do metrô Faculdad de Medicina, e perto de supermercados e restaurantes. O apartamento é amplo, agradável e está em boas condições. Perfeito para uma estadia em Buenos Aires. Se retornar a Buenos Aires, certamente locarei o mesmo espaço.

O apartamento é super bem localizado, só andamos a pé durante toda a estadia e fomos aos principais pontos turísticos. Além disso, é bem equipado, tinha tudo o que precisávamos para a nossa estadia. É um pouco mais antigo do que parece nas fotos, mas ainda assim confortável e bem quentinho (aquecedor ótimo) . O Gustavo é muito simpático e nos deu muitas dicas, super receptivo e de fácil comunicação.
Gustavo deserve a 6 star grade on host. Great guy

Gus's apartment is well set up for the traveller with easy access to all facilities. With just 4 Metro stops to the city centre all of BA is within easy reach. Gus is the consummate host and provided a service above and beyond any reasonable expectations; if you have a query, just ask.

Gustavo was such a nice host. He helped us with everything we needed. The communication was quick and very friendly. The apartment is big, full equipped and well located. I can highly recommend this place. Thanks Gustavo!

This apartement is very nice and has everthing you need, great kitchen with washing machine, big table for eating and working, huge bed with a very good mattress, enough space for your clothing, nice bathroom with shower. It is close to Subte B and D Callao and close to the most important colectivos to down town. All important shops are close and you have only 15 min to walk to 9 de Julio. I felt save at any time and I would stay there again.... 

so for me: one of the best places I ever had in BsAs and I recommend it!

The apartment is very well located within walking distance of places of interest and restaurants. Gustavo was most helpful in suggesting restaurants, things to do  and even organised tickets to a tango dinner show and a taxi to the airport for us. Highly recommended.
Great central location, clean and spacious apartment. Gus was great at communicating throughout our stay.
Buenos Aires maravilhosa. Apartamento incrível, exatamente como descrito. Muito obrigado Gustavo e até a próxima.

Gus was a great host the entire time we were down there. Any questions we had, he promptly responded to us, set up our transportation to/from the airport, and gave us plenty of suggestions of things to do around the city
It's a nice place, well located and the host is very thoughtful and helpful. The aptarment was well decorated and clean. Really recommend it!!

I enjoyed the stay. Gustavo's apartment is really nice and clean. The location is great and the recoleta neigborhood is beautiful and safe. I would definitely stay there again. Gustavo is a good host and informed us about all tourist areas and events of the city.

The apartment is in an idea location, close to most amenities. The metro (Subte) is close by (2 stations) and we were able to walk easily to many of the activities. The free walking tour was excellent and within walkable distance from the apartment. The apartment provided us with an excellent base. 

Thank you also to Gustavo, who was an excellent host. He was very quick with advice and communication. 

Excellent!
Within walking distance to most of the tourist hotspots, comfortable accomadation and Gustavo was a great host

Gus is an awesome host! The communication was effortless and everything went smoothly.  He had a map for me and a metro card that I could put money on. He showed me where the best steak was and tours I could take... and I HIGHLY recommend the Tango Show.  The apartment is very comfortable, clean, and in a great location, with tons of public transportation and food options in the area.  I was traveling solo and never felt unsafe or scared in the area.  

Gus is one of my favorite hosts I have ever met! He's so generous, funny, and very organized with having everything ready for me. I'm a travel blogger and am always off to some new adventure and Gus really made this trip a great one! 

O(URL HIDDEN)
(SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)
(URL HIDDEN)
Loved the place. Great location. Close to transit and lots of things to do and see. The even bigger value of this place is Gus's tips and insight.

Not only Gus' apartment, but all Buenos Aires is just incredible! The art, the places, people and everything.
Gus' apartment is a very good place, near from everything, subway stations, bus, restaurants, fastfoods, 9 de julio avenue, palaces, Obelisco and shops for everything.
Comfortable place whit a good furniture, a great view to historical building, has everything you need to a great experience in Buenos Aires.

Gustavo ist sehr nett, er hat uns persönlich empfangen und alles erklärt. Die Wohnung ist super, nur der Wasserstrahl der Dusche ist klein =D ansonsten perfekt. Supermarket, Kiosk, U Bahn und gutes Fleisch in der Nähe.
Had a wonderful time staying here. Gustavo was very helpful with checking in as we arrived much later than we thought we would when booked.  Very tidy space and a lot to see nearby.
Everything went well and it was very easy to communicate with Gustavo.

Just a few words of thanks for your wonderful hospitality and kind assistance! We truly enjoyed ourselves in your apartment, although the weather didn’t really cooperate. We found the location to be ideal; the apartment layout for my wife’s broken foot and all the things that go with that worked out just fine. Last but certainly not least were the excellent neighbours you have in this building. Each offered to help every time we went out or came in.

Finally Thank You for organizing our two trips to the airport and the help / suggestions you gave us the first day. Especially a huge thank you for looking after our luggage while we went to Iguazu Falls! We really appreciated the extra effort you gave to make our stay in Buenos Aires a wonderful experience.
john & Lucy

Gus was a great host, check in went very smoothly, he even arranged for a ride and someone to meet us at the airport. Gus always responded quickly to texts while we were there and was very helpful helping me retrieve something I left at the apartment. Highly recommended.
We loved it here! Perfect location and Gus was very helpful in finding places nearby. Thanks, Gustavo!
Por problemas na CIA aérea não pudemos usufruir da estadia, contudo Gustavo se mostrou prestativo a colaborar caso conseguisemos embarcar.
Gustavo was a very attentive and considerate host. The apartment is great, and the location is very handy for all BA attractions
Ótima localização, próximo do metrô, cafés, mercados e restaurantes. Igual as fotos e o Gustavo foi um ótimo anfitrião. Recomendo.

Gustavo's was ideal for our stay in Buenos Aires.  The apartment is clean, comfy, and the kitchen is particularly excellent. It is also within walking distance of many of Buenos Aires attractions. 

Gustavo himself was the perfect host - giving us an in-depth explanation of the things to do and where to dine in the area, booking a tango show for us, and organising a taxi to the airport. 

Would 100% stay here again!
Great stay in this flat. Well located in BA. Next to the subway and walking distance to the city center. Gus took time to give a lot of useful info on BA  and surroundings.

L'accueil de Gustavo a été parfait. Il a été très arrangeant pour les horaires d'arrivée et de départ et nous a répondus brièvement quand nous avions des questions. L'appartement est tres propre et dispose de tout ce qu'il faut. Il est très bien situé en centre ville autour des lignes de métro et dispose d'un ascenseur. La résidence est calme ainsi que la quartier ! Le séjour a été absolument parfait, n'hésitez pas à réserver !
Good central location, spacious kitchen, large comfortable bed, ample storage in bedroom, good sized modern bathroom. Host was very gracious, personable, and helpful. We enjoyed our stay.
I stayed there several Times ... and every time I leave, I know there will be a next one
Maravilhoso!

As fotos do imóvel correspondem a realidade. O Ap. está bem localizado, próximo ao metrô, o que facilita a locomoção pela cidade. E ainda mais, está próximo a sorveteria Cadore, que é muito melhor que a Freddo (visitem!). Dentro do apartamento há mapas e alguns guias turísticos, o que facilita muito pra quem está chegando. >>>>>> Agora uma informação que não tem relação com o imóvel mas que pode ser útil para quem está visitando Buenos Aires pela primeira vez e que pretende fazer um tour para conhecer a cidade. Procurem o Daniel da PreForTravel. Rua Florida, 362. Fica dentro da galeria Colón. Certamente o Daniel proporcionará um ótimo atendimento e boas sugestões de passeios.
Very clean, spacious unit.  Quiet neighbourhood that's central to all the spots and neighbourhoods you'll want to see.  Clarify and confirm check out times if changes are made, etc.
reviews.response:
Brian. YOU TOOK ADVANTAGE OF RICARDO CONFUSION. HERE S  THE ORIGINAL CONVERSATION WITH YOU!!!! ON DEC 11 TELLING YOU MUST LEAVE AT 11

Hi again! I m coordinating check ins during my absence. 

As your flight is landing at EZE airport, which is out of town, I can book a transfer from there and a driver will be waiting for you at Arrivals exit. Easy, fast and safe! This service is provided by Taxi Ezeiza, ride is one hour and their fixed price is ARS 650. If you want this please let me know. 

On the 11th, check out will be at regular time since there are other guests checking in. I ll let you know if I can be a little more flexible. 

Gus
19 de dic. de 2016

SO., WHAT YOU MENTIONED HERE IS UNNECESARY AND YOUR PRIVATE COMMENT IS UNNECESARY. IS CLOSE TO BE A LIE!!!!  AND YOU RE GIVING MALICIOUS WARNING TO MY GUESTS WHEN I NEVER HAD A PROBLEM REGARDING THIS. 

I M VERY PROFESSIONAL AND IF MY REPRESANTATIVE SADI SOMETHING DIFFERENT, YOU SHOULD DOUBLE CHECK WITH ME. 

ITS INCREDIBLE THAT AFTER ALL THE HELP I GAVE YOU YOU LEAVE SUCH A COMMENT.

reviews.comments:
The location is perfect, walking distance to Theator Colon as well as the book store. Bus 29 downstairs took you directly to la Boca and back. Many restaurants and things to do in the area. 
My only complaint is on the shower. The water is too small for taking a real shower. The apartment is on the top floor, hence you can expect the water pressure to be really small.

I wrote a review 5 years ago when I was the first guest to stay in this apartment, and I'm pleased to say the place is just as nice as I remember it, if not nicer. Comfy bed, plenty of hot water with decent water pressure, and amazing A/C. 

As an update I really liked the new decor, and it was nice to see the suggestions of things to do and places to eat left by previous guests.

Gustavo is a perfect host and this apartment is absolutely perfect.
This unit is so comfortable, I was sorry to leave. Gustavo is a great host.  The unit is perfect.
The apartment was great, always a pleasure to be hosted by Gus!

Gustavo was an amazing host. He was waiting for us even though we landed late at night. He recommended us key attractions at Buenos Aires and took the time to answer all our questions patiently. He also promptly replied us via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). Gus made sure we had a pleasant stay and went out of his way to accede to our requests. He was one of the reasons why we enjoyed our stay in BA so much. Thank you Gus! See you in Singapore soon!

Gustavo was very accommodating explaining the apartment and places to eat. In particular the day I was leaving there was a metro strike and he went out of his way to make sure I could make it to the bus station in time.
O espaço do Gus é ótimo, aconchegante e tem tudo por perto. Foi a primeira vez que usamos o Airbnb e, graças ao Gus, vamos continuar usando.
Beautiful spot in the heart of recoleta. Check in was great and Gustavo was very informative. Close to convenience stores and walkable to most other amenities.

Gustavo was an incredible host! He was very attentive with us during the time we went in the apartament and is extremely fast returning the messages. He gave us a lot of tips about the city and neighborhood. We recommend it! :) ps.: Buenos Aires is a great city, we are totally in love.
Amazing place, has a good mix of new and old design. The location is great and Gus was very helpful. I would recommend to stay here!

Our host greeted us with city maps, with lots of information on coffee shops, steak houses, free city walks, public transport, things to do and see, plus reassurance on how safe it was to walk in BA. Plenty of good cheese and cold meat shops close by. Just brilliant. Thanks Gustavo.
O lugar é bem localizado e o anfitrião oferece disponibilidade. Bom lugar para ficar.

The listing description was accurate and Gustavo was very  warm and welcoming. He made sure we were comfortable and that he had showed us how everything worked before he left. He made sure he was contactable by more than one means before he left. I liked the white board with local tips, places to eat and information for the apartment.

O Gus foi muito simpático conosco. Nos recebeu tarde da noite e explicou tudo sobre o bairro e a cidade, nos dando várias dicas. O apartamento é justamente igualzinho nas fotos e a localização é ótima, tem tudo perto. Recomendamos com certeza!

Que estadia maravilhosa! Gustavo foi um excelente anfitrião, respondeu nossos questionamentos sempre prontamente. Preparou nosso transfer e estava aguardando nossa chegada. Nos deu um mapa perfeito com todas as referências e principais pontos turísticos da cidade, além de ter dado aquelas dicas que só moradores de BA poderiam dar. O apartamento é idêntico ao apresentado nas fotos. A vizinhança é ótima para caminhadas. Perto de tudo e acesso fácil ao metrô. Obrigada por tudo (URL HIDDEN) ctz indicaremos para os amigos!
